name: Farenheit Project
description:
Overview

Farenheit Project is a short survival horror teaser. In this game you play as Elliot Ross, a young father that had to leave his home to provide for his family, working for a research lab in the arctic. Things in the lab go south quick as an unidentified species gets unleashed on a gruesome accident. Elliot must now find a way out.

Story

Elliot, a very loving father, had to take a job very far away from his family to afford his daughter's medical treatments.
As he is stuck in the arctic working as a cargo man, an unknown species was released in an accident and is turning people into monsters. Now his only drive to escape is to see his daughter again.

Features
  • Atmospheric environment.
  • Unnerving sound design.
  • Hand-to-hand and shooting combat mechanics.
